density.note: Less dense than water; household 70% solution is ~0.87 kg/L

specificHeat.note: High specific heat, similar to water

latentHeatOfVaporization.note: Moderate heat of vaporization; evaporates faster than water

evaporationCoefficient.note: Hertz-Knudsen α coefficient. Similar to ethanol - moderate volatility. Range 0.01-1.0.

antoineCoefficients.TminC_note: EMPIRICALLY VERIFIED RANGE MINIMUM: The Antoine coefficients were experimentally validated down to this temperature. Calculations below this are extrapolated (smooth curve continues, but accuracy may degrade).
antoineCoefficients.TmaxC_note: EMPIRICALLY VERIFIED RANGE MAXIMUM: The Antoine coefficients were experimentally validated up to this temperature. Calculations above this are extrapolated (smooth curve continues, but accuracy may degrade).
antoineCoefficients.source: Published thermodynamic data for isopropyl alcohol vapor pressure; experimentally verified over practical temperature range.

electricalConductivity.note: Very poor conductor; used for cleaning electronics

flammability.note: Highly flammable; flash point below room temperature

disinfectantEfficacy.note: 70% isopropanol is more effective than 99% for disinfection; water slows evaporation, allowing longer contact time to denature proteins
